article: the european union 's top diplomat , javier solana , on wednesday ruled out a greater role for nato in iraq in the near term , stressing the alliance 's existing commitments elsewhere , and said he could not see which countries might be able to provide troops .
abstract: solana nixes notion of greater short-term nato role in iraq
